BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Honorable Sylvia Hinds-Radix to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as the Corporation Counsel, pursuant to Sections 31 and 391 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Jocelyn Strauber to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as Commissioner of the Department of Investigation, pursuant to Section 31 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Jocelyn Strauber, Commissioner of the Department of Investigation
